monster.name: Penguin

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: The penguin can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

trait.name: Familiar
trait.text: With the DM's permission, the Find Familiar spell can summon a penguin.

action.name: Peck
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., 1 target. Hit: 1 (1d4-1) piercing damage.

monster.description:
Penguins are arctic or costal flightless birds. They are social animals, gathering in large groups together. They are often curious about their surrounds.
Source: DNDBeyond, Homebrew.
